title: BH Aerolight reshapes their fastest road bikes into one lightweight aero all-rounder
content:
BH has combined the best of their lightweight climber, fast aero carbon road, and even time trial / triathlon bikes into one new “ultimate road bike”, the repurposed 2022 BH Aerolight. With a light aero carbon frame and some unique new shaping, the reshaped Aerolight aims to be the perfect all-rounder for roadies looking to […]
